plot: A father on the verge of giving up finds hope and inspiration when his son reminds him that he's man enough to handle any situation.
title: Man Enough
plot_es: A father on the verge of giving up finds hope and inspiration when his son reminds him that he's man enough to handle any situation.
plot_en: A father on the verge of giving up finds hope and inspiration when his son reminds him that he's man enough to handle any situation.
